CutSceneText.Text: Thief!
Catch him!
Hey, you! Did you see a Wind Elyos brat who just ran through there?
What? Uhm, I don't really.....
Darn it, you frustrate me! Anyway, help me look for that kid!
Why should I...?
That brat stole something from the Captain of the Blood Sky Knights, [Jurid Jeridise]!
You must catch that brat, if you are a Tijeridian! Go and search quickly!
(Bleh, I guess it can't be helped...)
Eck! They found me!
We know you are inside there. Come out!
I can always run away again. Bye bye, pops!
Who are you to be interrupting me here? Move aside!
Wretch! So you were here!
Ugh...!
Captain Jurid!
You insolent punk! You dared to mess around in front of Lord Jurid!
You are one gutsy fellow, daring to lay a hand on my things in Tijerid of all places!
Now, take this thief to the dungeon! I will examine him when I get back!
Yes!
By the way, who are you? You don't look like a member of the Red Flame... It seems to me that you are an adventurer just starting out...?
I'm [%username].
Thank you, [%username]. We were able to catch the thief thanks to your help.
I will remember that name. Let us meet again if fate ever joins us once more, haha.
